# showsActivityIndicator

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the button displays an activity indicator instead of an image.

## Declaration

```swift
var showsActivityIndicator: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The button respects the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIButton/Configuration-swift.struct/imagePlacement] property when positioning the activity indicator.

## Configuring the activity indicator

- **activityIndicatorColorTransformer**: The color transformer for resolving the color of the activity indicator.
